Rob Pawlikowski as Jack, left, Hal Chernoff as Leo, and Mary Wilson as Florence, appear in a scene from “Leading Ladies.” The show is on stage at TheatreWorks New Milford from Friday, Sept. 18, through Sunday, Oct. 10. 

Photo: Rich Pettibone /Contributed Photo
